Class OrderScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.OrderScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OrderScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Used for implementing within a thread to detect changes to the size of the order output file.
    Author:
    pig
    See Also:
    Runnable, MyValidationException, Order

      • orderScan

        public void orderScan()
        Monitors the output file for a change in file size. Stops when allStop() is called from outside, or change is found.

      • changeInFileSize
